name: Ivana!
greetingText: Wish you all the best, my love! ❤️
wishText: May God bless every step you take and give you endless happiness. May your family and you always stay healthy and happy! Volim te! Happy Birthday, Ivana! 💖
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Wish you all the best, Ivana! 🥳 🥳 🥳
text2: I was just gonna text you...
text3: But then I realized I wanted to do more
text5Content: You mean the world to me, Ivana 💖
outroText: Hope you liked it! See you later, ljubavi! :D
replayText: If you want to see it again, just click this text!
